properties.name: delis.validation-artifact-folder
properties.description: Path to validation folder with artifacts for validation, with subfolders 'sch' for Schematron files and 'xsd' for Schema files

properties.name: delis.validator.persist.mode
properties.description: Whether requested files should be saved with result info or not. Values: none (default), all, failed

properties.name: delis.validator.persist.folder
properties.description: Path to folder to persist files
